title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Cut pancetta into small cubes
Grate pecorino cheese
Beat eggs in a bowl with grated cheese
Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Fry pancetta until crispy
Add cooked pasta to pancetta
Remove from heat and add egg mixture
Toss quickly to create creamy sauce
Season with black pepper and serve

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies perfect for any occasion
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Cream butter and sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs one at a time
Add vanilla extract
Gradually mix in flour mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheets
Bake for 9-11 minutes
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes

title: Grilled Salmon with Herbs
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled with aromatic herbs and lemon
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Mix olive oil, garlic, herbs, and lemon juice
Season salmon with salt and pepper
Brush herb mixture over salmon
Grill salmon for 6-7 minutes per side
Check for doneness with fork
Serve immediately with lemon wedges

title: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
description: Nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and tahini dressing
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F
Cook quinoa according to package directions
Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper
Roast vegetables for 25-30 minutes
Make tahini dressing by mixing tahini, lemon juice, and water
Assemble bowls with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and spinach
Top with avocado and drizzle with tahini dressing
Serve immediately

title: Beef Stir Fry
description: Quick and flavorful beef stir fry with vegetables and soy sauce
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in large wok or skillet
Add beef and cook until browned
Remove beef and set aside
Add vegetables to same pan
Stir fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute
Return beef to pan
Add soy sauce and oyster sauce
Toss everything together
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds
